no-var-keyword.disabled_reason: Violations in the codebase need to be fixed first.

no-unused-variable.disabled_reason: Violations in the codebase need to be fixed first.

no-use-before-declare.disabled_reason: Forces helper functions to be put above higher-level functions even though they'll definitely be defined by the time they're called (e.g. when both are defined at the top level). Putting higher-level functions first aids comprehension when reading code from top to bottom.
